item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Effective date: October 13, 2018 This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which Stou (“us”, “we”, or “our”) collects, uses, maintains and discloses information collected from users (each, a “User”) of the Services offered by Stou. This privacy policy applies to all mobile games, Facebook app, other products, websites and services offered by Stou (the “Service”). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.
